Setting.Name: ImportExport::ObjectBackendRegistration###Group
Setting.Description: Object backend module registration for the import/export modul.
Objekt-Backend Modul Registration des Import/Export Moduls.

Setting.Name: GroupImport::ForceCSVMappingRecreation
Setting.Description: Defines whether CSV-mappings are re-created on next package reinstallation or upgrade if already existent.
